name: USynthKnob
doc:
A simple widget that shows a sliding bar with a handle that allows you to control the value between 0..1.

* No Children

MouseSpeed: The speed of the mouse knob control
MouseFineTuneSpeed: The speed of the mouse knob control when fine-tuning the knob
ParameterName: The name of the pararameter. Will show when knob turns.
ParameterUnits: The parameter units (e.g. hz). Will append to synth tooltip info.
OnMouseCaptureBegin: Invoked when the mouse is pressed and a capture begins.
OnMouseCaptureEnd: Invoked when the mouse is released and a capture ends.
OnControllerCaptureBegin: Invoked when the controller capture begins.
OnControllerCaptureEnd: Invoked when the controller capture ends.
OnValueChanged: Called when the value is changed by slider or typing.
StepSize: The amount to adjust the value by, when using a controller or keyboard
ShowTooltipInfo: Enable tool tip window to show parameter information while knob turns
Locked: Whether the handle is interactive or fixed.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.doc: Gets the current value of the slider.

methods.name: SetLocked
methods.doc: Sets the handle to be interactive or fixed

methods.name: SetStepSize
methods.doc: Sets the amount to adjust the value by, when using a controller or keyboard

methods.name: SetValue
methods.doc: Sets the current value of the slider.
